text: Ani yadi yiniharule timro kura svikara gardainan bhane timile yo visvasa gara ki yiniharu matra aphna icchaharuko anusarana gardaichan ra usabhanda dherai margavicalita ko hunsakcha? Jasale allahako margadarsana chodera aphno icchakopachi hindeko cha. Nihsandeha allahale atyacariharula'i margadarsana gardaina
